modName: Main Menu Music From Trailer With Malukah addon v1
summary:
Replaces Mainmenu music with trailer music and malukahs great composition
Thanx to Malukah and Bethesda for the song.
descriptionHtml:
Malukahs permission for her song as stated in the description on youtube video:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4z9TdDCWN7g&feature=youtu.be&hd=1

QUOTE: \'\'I am ok with anyone using this recording for mods or videos, as long as they are free and you credit Bethesda/Jeremy Soule for the music and me for the recording of this cover. Also, please link back to this video! :D Thanks!\'\'

Replaces Mainmenu music with trailer music and malukahs great composition.

Install:
Extract to your skyrim folder and replace Data map.

Includes also:
-Moss Wall Wallpaper 1920 x 1080
-Mp3 file

It begins with this trailer music:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PjqsYzBrP-M

And Ends with Malukahs Masterpiece:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4z9TdDCWN7g&feature=youtu.be&hd=1

If you want your Main Menu to look like my wallpaper download hellstorm102s mod:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3708
File is under \'\'version J\'\'

.xwm files seem terribly quiet so if anyone can enhance it you are free to use this as you see fit, but you must give credit to all involved!

Thanx Go to
-Malukah
-Hellstorm102
-Bethesda
-Jeremy Soule

Enjoy! :D
author: ThorTheViking
